data.title: TAR UC Program
data.meta_description: Campbell has been involved in a cooperative program with Tunku Abdul Rahman University College (TAR UC) in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia since 1979 to offer a bachelor of science degree to select students.
data.text:
Campbell University has been involved in a cooperative program with Tunku Abdul Rahman University College (TAR UC) in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia since 1979. The program provides a Bachelor of Science degree for selected TAR UC students.

This fully accredited program has provided a needed educational opportunity in the sciences, preparing TAR UC students to be productive and honorable citizens of the nation of Malaysia.

Since the partnership started, the program has graduated over 13,000 students.

Visit TAR UC
